phrases: Your brother is here to see you.
Father would not approve of your hair for sure.
I bet he would have cut it off with a saber.
You have always been like that.
I brought you something nice today to celebrate your promotion.
Only use it as a weapon.
I found her in the northeastern war zone.
She is going to start working today as an Auto Memory Doll apprentice.
She did not have any facial expressions,
that were named after this industry.
How much do you know about what Auto Memory Dolls do?
They write letters at the request of others.
I cannot say that I completely understand, but I think I can perform my duties.
That reminds me, I have not introduced the other Dolls to you yet.
I understand it is an abbreviation for Auto Memory Doll.
-I figured it out the other day.
She is a new hire who just completed her training course.
She and I have both been working as Dolls for a while.
This company is still pretty young,
so, we are all like rookies here.
Violet, do you know how to use a typewriter?
I have never used one before.
Then why do not you start off by practicing typing?
It is not that easy to become a Doll.
Iris, can we borrow your manual?
Then why do not you try it out a bit?
Turn the knob and feed it in.
Place your pointer fingers on the F and J keys, and try typing something.
Just memorize where your fingers should go for the different letters.
Try typing what it says in this manual.
Can you type a little more...
I have bought fried noodles for you.
And do not come to the reception looking so sweaty like that.
When you see a man who is been toiling away,
cannot you at least say, Thanks for your hard work?
And what do they mean, Do not come?
They are just trying to snag rich guys at reception.
No more working girls for me.
And stop calling me Hey, you.
I will have some fried noodles.
I am stuck just writing addresses again today.
The two reservations we have this afternoon
I came all the way to Leiden to become a Doll,
but all I do is write addresses
and inquiries about missing people from the war every day.
By the way, I heard that new girl used to be in the army.
Even though she is still a child?
They do not have to make her a Doll.
She is not right for this job.
I want to write letters that are more exciting!
Like a letter for a famous person.
Or a secret love letter for an actress.
But those jobs always go to Cattleya.
I invited her to lunch, but she said she did not need to recharge.
She is just been practicing typing the entire time.
Hey, then treat me to dinner, Claudia.
Do not call me by my first name!
Just because you wanted a girl.
Calling out a girl's name in bed.
I cannot take you anytime soon.
I am not getting paid this month.
I am done writing the addresses.
I will bring these to the delivery department.
Violet, thanks for your hard work.
This weapon is what is amazing.
It is a weapon for working girls like us to go out into society and fight.
I will have you sit next to a real Doll tomorrow and shadow her.
I am going out for a delivery service now.
we go to their house or workplace to write for them.
Can I take this with me, too?
I want to tell him that I have started a writing job and begun training.
I want to report my current status.
I am sure the major is still busy...
and cannot see me yet, right?
I will send this for you.
it is hard making ends meet every day.
As you already know, living expenses are tight.
Tell him I will pay back two chlor every month.
-If you pay back two chlor every month,
it will take you 120 years to pay back everything.
Sir, will you be able to survive until then?
But sometimes she gets really mad.
I am sorry for hurting your precious child.
Maybe I did not discipline her well.
-Um... -Crying gets in the way of our work.
What do you mean by this letter?
I am sorry for my selfish request...
This makes it seem like it is all my fault!
Who do you think you are?!
I did not ask her name!
Anyways, I do not like this letter.
I am not paying for this!
Refusing to pay because you did not like it is illegal.
What do not you like about it?
We have received complaints from a few customers.
-There is nothing wrong with my health.
-No, I mean about working as a Doll.
We do not have any more reservations today.
We are going to work diligently together
to make the membership list for the Chamber of Commerce after this.
Type the company and the address.
Why do you want to do this job?
we will write any type of document for you.
Where is the Doll named Cattleya Baudelaire?
She is on a business trip.
Oh, I came here because I heard you can never go wrong with her.
A man who started an automobile company.
He said every household is going to own a car in the future.
I am not such a simple woman.
I do not want him to think I am easy.
Well, he is not that great of a catch.
I do not have any feelings for him.
If he showed me he is serious, and if he really loves me...
Please write an elegant and romantic letter.
Are you the one who is going to write it?
What is up with that letter?
-I wrote it just as you requested.
He got angry and sent the letter back to me!
However, I do not have feelings for you now.
Furthermore, your seriousness and love are insufficient.
I am a complex and serious woman.
What is wrong with this letter?
The expressions used were too straight.
But if I accepted his request too soon,
he would think that I am too easy!
Women want men to chase them,
Water or hot water is enough for rehydrating.
It might have been too soon to give you such a hard job.
I wrote the letter incorporating her requests as much as I could.
What one says is not the whole truth.
They test others to confirm their own existence.
I am going to apologize to him in person.
Then did you make a mistake at work?
Come back to the delivery department.
Forget about working as a Doll.
Is not it better to find another job?
I should look for a job, too.
he is not getting paid this month.
Seems like our company is not doing well.
Can I ask you a question?
Am I suited to become an Auto Memory Doll?
I am not asking about you.
You are not suited for it.
Why do you want to do this job in the first place?
I want to know what I love you means.
I understand that those words express a particular emotion.
Why did the major say those words to me?
I still want to continue with this job,
even if I am not suited for it.
There is a towel in the locker room.
I think working as a Doll is too hard for Violet.
This company is still new, but we get so many requests for Cattleya.
But if we get a bad reputation because of this...
Just when things are about to take off.
-It is better to have Violet quit.
-No, give her a little more time.
I do not think we should make her quit!
is very accurate and fast when she types,
and she can do tasks like making membership lists and writing addresses.
I think she will be able to write letters.
You said I am not suited for this duty.
I am the one who is not suited to being an Auto Memory Doll.
That is why I got so serious about defending her.
The machine that was a prototype for the typewriter
was originally invented by Dr. Orland, the authority on letterpress printing.
His wife, Mollie, was a novelist,
but she became blind and could not write anymore.
He created the typewriter for her.
The doctor called it the Auto Memory Doll.
That term now refers to the industry of writing for others.
Meeting her made me remember my dream, which I had almost forgotten.
My feelings, which were buried away.
Just like how my heart was moved by the novels written by Orland's wife.
-I am going to close up shop.
I want to write beautiful letters that can move peoples' hearts, too.
Oh, and do not forget this.
This is the brooch the major gave me!
It was on the black market.
Someone must have stolen it from your belongings.
do you want to attend a Doll training course?
I think it will be good for you.
That is why you did not get paid this month?
Hey, who is the major she talks about?
He is a friend from my Military Academy days.
He is from the Bougainvillea family.
Even though he is from a rich family,
he was a man with spirit.
